item.title: Absolute proof of time travel: A creative writing exercise...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Henry Stone)
item.dc:creator: Henry Stone
item.content:encoded:
I've browsed through so many debates on proving/debunking time travel at this point, both here and elsewhere, that the point of them has become rather silly. I am a stern advocate for humanity needing a clearer idea of what TT entails before even starting to discuss possible ways to prove it to be real. When someone says "how would you prove it if you were a time traveller?" or "how can you prove that John Titor was real/fake?", I just sort it in the "if a tree falls in the woods and no one...

Absolute proof of time travel: A creative writing exercise...

item.title: The Butterfly Effect
item.author: invalid@example.com (JScannell)
item.dc:creator: JScannell
item.content:encoded:
Has anyone seen the preview for The Butterfly Effect movie coming out next month? It looks awesome http://www.butterflyeffectmovie.com/ It's about a guy that learns that he has the ability to change things he's done in the past. The special effects in the movie show the changes that happened as a result (using 3D morphing) He's faced with the consequences of changing the past only to have to go back to another time to fix the worse things...

The Butterfly Effect

item.title: Creedo gets sent down to alternate resources:
item.author: invalid@example.com (creedo299)
item.dc:creator: creedo299
item.content:encoded:
Creedo gets sent down to alternate resources:

Creedo walks to the office door and knocks.

answer from behind the door,..Come in!

Creedo enters and sees Darby at Roel's desk.

Creedo,..Hi Darby' what are you doing here?

Darby,..Roel got overbooked and asked me to fill in for him.

Creedo,..you had wanted to,...?

Darby,..Yeah' there's a problem here.

Roel sent me your file and asked me to ask you, if you would continue down in alternate energies?

Creedo,..Sh*t! I'm getting too close...

Creedo gets sent down to alternate resources:

item.title: Demonstration to on-board general subject here use.
item.author: invalid@example.com (pinterest)
item.dc:creator: pinterest
item.content:encoded:
I know that this seems weird but here is what you all wanted.

You must all first sing the song from Lost Horizionm, Liveing And working togeaher.Do it, dont ask why.

Secondly time travel accidents can look like this.A time traveler materializes with half of his machine in a tree, is laying on the back half unconscious as if this had been a wreck.A large ice cream truck shows up that looks as if to be a gasoline tanker, however is full of ice cream and people are handing out free icecream...

Demonstration to on-board general subject here use.

item.title: Songs by time travelers
item.author: invalid@example.com (newbie_0)
item.dc:creator: newbie_0
item.content:encoded:
Post them here if the songwriter was clearly from the future,

Simon & Garfunkle - Hazy Shade of Winter

Time, time, time, see what's become of me
While I looked around
For my possibilities
I was so hard to please
But look around, leaves are brown
And the sky is a hazy shade of winter

Hear the salvation army band
Down by the riverside, it's bound to be a better ride
Than what you've got planned
Carry your cup in your hand
And look around, leaves are brown now
And the sky is a hazy shade of...

Songs by time travelers
